none.$description: No shadow. Flat elements, disabled states.

sm.$description: Small elevation - subtle depth for chips, small cards. Gentle shadow on dark backgrounds.

md.$description: Medium elevation - default for cards, surfaces. Bento cards use this for gentle hierarchy.

lg.$description: Large elevation - prominent cards, modals, dialogs. Strong depth on dark mode.

xl.$description: Extra large elevation - floating elements, FABs, important overlays. Maximum depth.

inner.$description: Inner shadow - for pressed states, inset elements, subtle depth inversion.

focus.$description: Focus glow (sky blue) for keyboard navigation. Accessibility requirement - 3:1 contrast.

accent.$description: Accent glow (coral) for hover states on important actions. Subtle playful effect.
